mapper.select: SELECT b.no, title, b.writer, views, COUNT(rno) reply_count FROM ( SELECT no, title, writer, views FROM tbl_board ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}) b LEFT JOIN tbl_reply r ON b.no = r.no GROUP BY b.no ORDER BY b.no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (no, title, writer, views, contents) VALUES (#{no}, #{title}, #{writer}, 0, #{contents})
